### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining and Storage at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a Chest (position x=42.5, y=-83.5) for storing coal.

### Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) with no ingredients to smelt.

### Coal Transportation at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) that transports coal from the Chest (position x=44.5, y=-81.5) to the Chest (position x=43.5, y=-79.5).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drill
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before mining.
- Refuel the drill when it is out of fuel.
### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure there are ingredients to smelt in the furnace.
### Errors when managing inventory
- Ensure there is enough coal in the inventory to refuel the drill and furnace.
- Ensure there is enough iron ore in the inventory to smelt in the furnace.
